    P

    packCalls - Variable in class system.GameView
    How many times has pack() been called during game init
    packWindow() - Method in class system.GameView
    Packs the window.
    PASS - Static variable in class system.Const
    Represents the pass action.
    peekNextPlayer() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Looks at the next player without changing the turn order.
    pGameWinner - Variable in class system.GameModel
    The list of players who have won the game (for multi-winner modes).
    PLAY - Static variable in class system.Const
    Represents the play action.
    playAce() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Aces reverse the turn order.
    playCard(Card) - Method in class system.GameModel
    Attempts to play a card onto the last card of the played cards zone.
    playedCards - Variable in class system.GameModel
    The pile of cards that have been played so far.
    playedCards - Variable in class system.GameView
    The last played (discarded) card
    playEight() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Eights allow the player to choose a new suit for the played eight.
    Player - Class in sysobj
    Players have a name, a hand of cards, a score, an orientation in the UI, and a flag for if they are human or not.
    Player() - Constructor for class sysobj.Player
    Default Player constructor.
    Player(String) - Constructor for class sysobj.Player
    Name-only constructor for a Player.
    Player(String, int) - Constructor for class sysobj.Player
    Parameterized constructor for Player.
    Player(String, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class sysobj.Player
    Constructor for a player.
    playerEastCards - Variable in class system.GameView
    Panel that holds the cards for the player in the the East zone of the UI
    playerEastName - Variable in class system.GameView
    Label for the East player's name
    playerEastScore - Variable in class system.GameView
    Score for East player
    playerName - Variable in class system.GameController
    The name of the current player.
    playerNorthCards - Variable in class system.GameView
    Panel that holds the cards for the player in the the North zone of the UI
    playerNorthName - Variable in class system.GameView

    playerNorthScore - Variable in class system.GameView
    Score for North player
    players - Variable in class system.GameModel
    The list of all players currently in the game.

    Panel that holds the cards for the player in the the South zone of the UI
    playerSouthName - Variable in class system.GameView

    playerWestCards - Variable in class system.GameView

    playerWestName - Variable in class system.GameView
    Label for the West player's name
    playerWestScore - Variable in class system.GameView
    Score for West player
    playFour() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Fours force the next player in the turn order to draw four cards.
    playQueen() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Queens skip the turn of the next player.
    playTwo() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Twos force the next player in the turn order to draw two times the number of twos played consecutively cards.
    processConsoleMsg(String, String, String) - Method in class system.GameController
    Sends a console message to the host's UI, if they are the host, and tells each client to show the console message if they are a client.
    processTurn() - Method in class system.GameController
    Core logic of the gameplay loop.
    pRoundWinner - Variable in class system.GameModel
    The player who won the current or most recent round.
